thread.title: Warning over black ice across Donegal
thread.title_full: Warning over black ice across Donegal

author: Staff Writer
title: Warning over black ice across Donegal
text:
Pictured: Road conditions in Gweedore this morning.
Difficult conditions have been reported in many parts of Donegal this Thursday morning.
Motorists are urged to take extreme care on the roads due to black ice.
Council gritters have treated all main routes, but drivers should assume no road is ice-free.
There are reports of several cars off the road at Barnesmore Gap this morning.
School bus operators are operating with extreme caution this morning.
“As a safety precaution, if your estates are slippy, please try to make your way to the entrance as we may not be able to enter them,” said a notice from McGettigan Travel in Letterkenny.
A status yellow snow-ice warning for Donegal, Cavan, Monaghan, Leitrim and Sligo remains in place until 12noon today.
Click here to view live cameras of road conditions in areas of Donegal: https://donegal.maps.arcgis.com/apps/dashboards/989516ab92554f10ae6b3b7338e80063
